title: Roof tile
description: Roof tile, green glaze; cross between lion, dragon and Foo Dog.  Black eyes.  Entire piece otherwise grass green.  Glaze worn through in spots on tile proper and animal?s right side.  Said to have come from one of the Palaces of the Forbidden City, Peking.
creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
